content.query:
let data = CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct has 'PAN-OS'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where Activity =~ 'THREAT' and DeviceEventClassID != 'url' and DeviceEventClassID != 'file';
data
| summarize Count = count() by DeviceEventClassID
| join kind = inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by DeviceEventClassID)
 on DeviceEventClassID
| project-away DeviceEventClassID1, TimeGenerated
| extend DeviceEventClassIDs = DeviceEventClassID
| union (
 data 
 | summarize Count = count() 
 | extend jkey = 1
 | join kind=inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain}
 | extend jkey = 1) on jkey
 | extend DeviceEventClassID = 'All', DeviceEventClassIDs = '*' 
)
| project DeviceEventClassID, Count, Trend
| order by Count desc
| take 10
content.title: Threats, by subtypes

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct has 'PAN-OS'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where Activity =~ 'THREAT' and DeviceEventClassID != 'url' and DeviceEventClassID != 'file'
| where '{SelectedSubtype}' == "All" or '{SelectedSubtype}'==DeviceEventClassID
| where '{SelectedWildfire}' == "All" or '{SelectedWildfire}'==DeviceCustomString2
| where '{SelectedSeverity}' == "All" or '{SelectedSeverity}'==LogSeverity
| summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h), DeviceEventClassID
| render timechart
content.title: Threat subtypes over time

content.query:
let data = CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct has 'PAN-OS'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where Activity =~ 'THREAT' and DeviceEventClassID != 'url' and DeviceEventClassID != 'file'
| where '{SelectedSubtype}' == "All" or '{SelectedSubtype}'==DeviceEventClassID
| where '{SelectedWildfire}' == "All" or '{SelectedWildfire}'==DeviceCustomString2
| where '{SelectedSeverity}' == "All" or '{SelectedSeverity}'==LogSeverity;
data
| summarize Count = count() by ApplicationProtocol
| join kind = inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by ApplicationProtocol)
 on ApplicationProtocol
| project-away ApplicationProtocol1, TimeGenerated
| extend ApplicationProtocols = ApplicationProtocol
| union (
 data 
 | summarize Count = count() 
 | extend jkey = 1
 | join kind=inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain}
 | extend jkey = 1) on jkey
 | extend ApplicationProtocol = 'All', ApplicationProtocols = '*' 
)
| project ApplicationProtocol, Count, Trend
| order by Count desc
| take 10
content.title: Threats, by application

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct has 'PAN-OS'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where Activity =~ 'THREAT'
| where '{SelectedSubtype}' == "All" or '{SelectedSubtype}'==DeviceEventClassID
| where '{SelectedWildfire}' == "All" or '{SelectedWildfire}'==DeviceCustomString2
| where '{SelectedSeverity}' == "All" or '{SelectedSeverity}'==LogSeverity
| project TimeGenerated, ReceiptTime, LogSeverity, DeviceAction, ['URL Category'] =DeviceCustomString2, DestinationPort, DestinationIP, Message, SourcePort, SourceIP, DestinationUserID, RequestURL
content.title: Threat events

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct has 'PAN-OS'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where DeviceEventClassID =~ 'vulnerability' 
| extend ThreatId = extract('cat=([^;]+)',1,AdditionalExtensions) 
| summarize Amount=count() by ThreatId, LogSeverity
| top 20 by Amount
content.title: Top vulnerability events

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct has 'PAN-OS'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| search DeviceEventClassID:'*virus*'
| summarize Amount=count() by RequestURL, DeviceEventClassID, DestinationIP, SourceIP, ApplicationProtocol
| top 20 by Amount
